meta.hint: A compound word is made from two smaller words.
meta.question: Identify the correct homophone of the word.

content.description:
There are no nuts left for the cake.
Select the homophone of know.

A silver fish swam in the sea
Select the homophone of See.

Did you hear what he said?
Select the homophone of here.

We need two people for this work.
Select the homophone of to

You too can join us for the party.
Select the homophone of two
